articles.title: Writer and poet Benjamin Zephaniah dies aged 65 - BBC News - BBC News
articles.description: Writer and poet Benjamin Zephaniah has been remembered as a "titan of British literature" after his death aged 65. He died early on Thursday with his wife by...

articles.author: Jane Englefield
articles.title: "Compassionate and nurturing" Peach Fuzz named as Pantone Colour of the Year 2024 - Dezeen
articles.description: Peach Fuzz is Pantone's 2024 colour of the year, which is a subtle orangey hue that was chosen to express a yearning for community during uncertain times.
articles.content:
Colour specialist Pantone has announced Peach Fuzz as its 2024 colour of the year, a subtle orangey hue that was chosen to express a yearning for community and cosiness during uncertain times.
